original: Majjhima Nikāya 125
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Dantabhūmisutta
analyzed: dantabhūmi sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena aciravato samaṇuddeso araññakuṭikāyaṁ viharati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena aciravataḥ samaṇuddesaḥ arañña kuṭikāyam viharati

original: Atha kho jayaseno rājakumāro jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno yena aciravato samaṇuddeso tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā aciravatena samaṇuddesena saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha khalu jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ yena aciravataḥ samaṇuddeso tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā aciravatena samaṇuddesena saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho jayaseno rājakumāro aciravataṁ samaṇuddesaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ aciravatam samaṇuddesam etat avoca

original: “Sutaṁ metaṁ, bho aggivessana:
analyzed: sutam mā ita bho aggivessana

original: ‘idha bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggatan’”ti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ phuseyya cittassa ekagga tanti

original: “Evametaṁ, rājakumāra, evametaṁ, rājakumāra.
analyzed: evam eta rāja kumāra evam eta rāja kumāra

original: Idha bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggatan”ti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ phuseyya cittassa ekagga tanti

original: “Sādhu me bhavaṁ aggivessano yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ desetū”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhavan aggivessanaḥ yathāsutam yathāpariyattam dhammam desetu uti

original: “Na kho te ahaṁ, rājakumāra, sakkomi yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ desetuṁ.
analyzed: na kho te aha rāja kumāra sakkomi yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhammam desetu

original: Ahañca hi te, rājakumāra, yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ, tvañca me bhāsitassa atthaṁ na ājāneyyāsi; so mamassa kilamatho, sā mamassa vihesā”ti.
analyzed: aham ca hi te rāja kumāra yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhammam deseyya tvañca me bhāsitassa attham na ājāneyyāsi saḥ mamassa kilamatho sā mamassa vihesā ati

original: “Desetu me bhavaṁ aggivessano yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ.
analyzed: desetu me bhavan aggivessanaḥ yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhamma

original: Appevanāmāhaṁ bhoto aggivessanassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājāneyyan”ti.
analyzed: appevanāmā aham bhoto aggivessanassa bhāsitassa attham ājāneyyanti

original: “Deseyyaṁ kho te ahaṁ, rājakumāra, yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ.
analyzed: deseyyam kho te aha rāja kumāra yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhamma

original: Sace me tvaṁ bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājāneyyāsi, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
analyzed: sace me tvam bhāsitassa attham ājāneyyāsi iccā itam kusala

original: no ce me tvaṁ bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājāneyyāsi, yathāsake tiṭṭheyyāsi, na maṁ tattha uttariṁ paṭipuccheyyāsī”ti.
analyzed: no ce me tvam bhāsitassa attham ājāneyyāsi yathāsake tiṭṭheyyāsi na mama tattha uttarim paṭipuccheyyāsi iti

original: “Desetu me bhavaṁ aggivessano yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ.
analyzed: desetu me bhavan aggivessanaḥ yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhamma

original: Sace ahaṁ bhoto aggivessanassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānissāmi, iccetaṁ kusalaṁ;
analyzed: sace aham bhotaḥ aggivessanassa bhāsitassa attham ājānissāmi iccā itam kusala

original: no ce ahaṁ bhoto aggivessanassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānissāmi, yathāsake tiṭṭhissāmi, nāhaṁ tattha bhavantaṁ aggivessanaṁ uttariṁ paṭipucchissāmī”ti.
analyzed: no ce aham bhotaḥ aggivessanassa bhāsitassa attham ājānissāmi yathā asake tiṭṭhissāmi na aham tattha bhavantam aggivessanam uttarim paṭipucchissāmi iti

original: Atha kho aciravato samaṇuddeso jayasenassa rājakumārassa yathāsutaṁ yathāpariyattaṁ dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: atha kho aciravataḥ samaṇuddesaḥ jayasenassa rāja kumārassa yathāsutam yathā pariyattam dhammam desesi

original: Evaṁ vutte, jayaseno rājakumāro aciravataṁ samaṇuddesaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ aciravatam samaṇuddesam etat avoca

original: “aṭṭhānametaṁ, bho aggivessana, anavakāso yaṁ bhikkhu appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto phuseyya cittassa ekaggatan”ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam eta bho aggivessana anavakāsaḥ yam bhikkhu appamattaḥ ātāpī pahitattaḥ viharantaḥ phuseyya cittassa ekagga tanti

original: Atha kho jayaseno rājakumāro aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa aṭṭhānatañca anavakāsatañca pavedetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ aciravatassa samaṇuddesassa aṭṭhāna tat ca anavakāsa tat ca pavedetvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho aciravato samaṇuddeso acirapakkante jayasene rājakumāre yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha khalu aciravataḥ samaṇa uddesaḥ acira pakkante jayasene rāja kumāre yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho aciravato samaṇuddeso yāvatako ahosi jayasenena rājakumārena saddhiṁ kathāsallāpo taṁ sabbaṁ bhagavato ārocesi.
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho aciravataḥ samaṇuddesaḥ yāvatakaḥ ahosi jayasenena rāja kumārena saddhim kathā sallāpo tam sabbam bhagavataḥ ārocesi

original: Evaṁ vutte, bhagavā aciravataṁ samaṇuddesaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte bhagavā aciravatam samaṇuddesam etat avoca

original: “‘taṁ kutettha, aggivessana, labbhā.
analyzed: tam kuta itthā aggivessana labbhā

original: Yaṁ taṁ nekkhammena ñātabbaṁ nekkhammena daṭṭhabbaṁ nekkhammena pattabbaṁ nekkhammena
analyzed: yam tam nekkhammena ñātabbam nekkhammena daṭṭhabbam nekkhammena pattabbam nekkhammena

original: sacchikātabbaṁ taṁ vata jayaseno rājakumāro kāmamajjhe vasanto kāme paribhuñjanto
analyzed: sacchikātabbam tam vata jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ kāma majjhe vasantaḥ kāme paribhuñjantaḥ

original: kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno kāmapariyesanāya ussuko ñassati
analyzed: kāma vitakkehi khajjamānaḥ kāma pariḷāhena pariḍayhamānaḥ kāma pariyesanāya ussukaḥ ñassati

original: vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatī’ti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpissu, aggivessana, dve hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vā sudantā suvinītā, dve hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vā adantā avinītā.
analyzed: seyyathā api su aggivessana dve hatthi dammā vā assa dammā vā go dammā vā su dantā su vinītā dve hatthi dammā vā assa dammā vā go dammā vā adantā avinītā

original: Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, aggivessana,
analyzed: tam kim maññasi aggivessana

original: ye te dve hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vā sudantā suvinītā, api nu te dantāva dantakāraṇaṁ gaccheyyuṁ, dantāva dantabhūmiṁ sampāpuṇeyyun”ti?
analyzed: ye te dve hatthi dammā vā assa dammā vā go dammā vā su dantā su vinītā api nu te dantā ava danta kāraṇam gaccheyyu dantā ava danta bhūmim sampāpuṇeyyuḥ iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: eva bhante

original: “Ye pana te dve hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vā adantā avinītā, api nu te
analyzed: ye pana te dve hatthi dammāḥ vā assa dammāḥ vā go dammāḥ vā a dantāḥ a vinītāḥ api nu te

original: adantāva dantakāraṇaṁ gaccheyyuṁ, adantāva dantabhūmiṁ sampāpuṇeyyuṁ, seyyathāpi
analyzed: a dantāḥ ava danta kāraṇam gaccheyyu a dantāḥ ava danta bhūmim sampāpuṇeyyu sā iyyathā api

original: te dve hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vā sudantā suvinītā”ti?
analyzed: te dve hatthi dammā vā assa dammā vā go dammā vā su dantā su vinītā ati

original: “No hetaṁ, bhante”.
analyzed: naḥ heta bhante

original: “Evameva kho, aggivessana, ‘yaṁ taṁ nekkhammena ñātabbaṁ nekkhammena daṭṭhabbaṁ nekkhammena
analyzed: evam eva kho aggivessana yam tam nekkhammena ñātabbam nekkhammena daṭṭhabbam nekkhammena

original: pattabbaṁ nekkhammena sacchikātabbaṁ taṁ vata jayaseno rājakumāro kāmamajjhe vasanto
analyzed: pattabbam nekkhammena sacchikātabbam tam vata jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ kāma majjhe vasantaḥ

original: kāme paribhuñjanto kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno kāmapariyesanāya
analyzed: kāme paribhuñjantaḥ kāma vitakkehi khajjamānaḥ kāma pariḷāhena pariḍayhamānaḥ kāma pariyesanāya

original: ussuko ñassati vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatī’ti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: ussukaḥ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahāpabbato.
analyzed: seyyathā api aggivessana gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahā pabbataḥ

original: Tamenaṁ dve sahāyakā tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā nikkhamitvā hatthavilaṅghakena yena
analyzed: tam enam dve sahāyakā tamhā gāmā vā nigamā vā nikkhamitvā hattha vilaṅghakena yena

original: so pabbato tenupasaṅkameyyuṁ; upasaṅkamitvā eko sahāyako heṭṭhā pabbatapāde tiṭṭheyya,
analyzed: saḥ pabbataḥ tena upasaṅkameyyu upasaṅkamitvā ekaḥ sahāyakaḥ heṭṭhā pabbata pāde tiṭṭheyya

original: eko sahāyako uparipabbataṁ āroheyya.
analyzed: ekaḥ sahāyakaḥ upari pabbatam āroheyya

original: Tamenaṁ heṭṭhā pabbatapāde ṭhito sahāyako uparipabbate ṭhitaṁ sahāyakaṁ evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam heṭṭhā pabbata pāde ṭhitaḥ sahāyakaḥ upari pabbate ṭhitam sahāyakam evam vadeyya

original: ‘yaṁ, samma, kiṁ tvaṁ passasi uparipabbate ṭhito’ti?
analyzed: ya samma kim tvam passasi upari pabbate ṭhito ti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ u evam vadeyya

original: ‘passāmi kho ahaṁ, samma, uparipabbate ṭhito ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: passāmi kho aha samma upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ u evam vadeyya

original: ‘aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ, samma, anavakāso yaṁ tvaṁ uparipabbate ṭhito passeyyāsi ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam kho eta samma anavakāsaḥ yam tvam upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ passeyyāsi ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakam ti

original: Tamenaṁ uparipabbate ṭhito sahāyako heṭṭhimapabbatapādaṁ orohitvā taṁ sahāyakaṁ bāhāyaṁ gahetvā uparipabbataṁ āropetvā muhuttaṁ assāsetvā evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: tam enam upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ sahāyakaḥ heṭṭhima pabbata pādam orohitvā tam sahāyakam bāhāyam gahetvā upari pabbatam āropetvā muhuttam assāsetvā evam vadeyya

original: ‘yaṁ, samma, kiṁ tvaṁ passasi uparipabbate ṭhito’ti?
analyzed: ya samma kim tvam passasi upari pabbate ṭhito ti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ u evam vadeyya

original: ‘passāmi kho ahaṁ, samma, uparipabbate ṭhito ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: passāmi kho aha samma upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ u evam vadeyya

original: ‘idāneva kho te, samma, bhāsitaṁ—mayaṁ evaṁ ājānāma—
analyzed: idānā iva kho te samma bhāsita mayam evam ājānāma

original: aṭṭhānaṁ kho etaṁ samma, anavakāso yaṁ tvaṁ uparipabbate ṭhito passeyyāsi ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: aṭṭhānam kho etam samma anavakāsaḥ yam tvam upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ passeyyāsi ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakam ti

original: Idāneva ca pana te bhāsitaṁ mayaṁ evaṁ ājānāma:
analyzed: idānā iva ca pana te bhāsitam mayam evam ājānāma

original: ‘passāmi kho ahaṁ, samma, uparipabbate ṭhito ārāmarāmaṇeyyakaṁ vanarāmaṇeyyakaṁ bhūmirāmaṇeyyakaṁ pokkharaṇīrāmaṇeyyakan’ti.
analyzed: passāmi kho aha samma upari pabbate ṭhitaḥ ārāma rāmaṇeyyakam vana rāmaṇeyyakam bhūmi rāmaṇeyyakam pokkharaṇī rāmaṇeyyakanti

original: So evaṁ vadeyya:
analyzed: saḥ u evam vadeyya

original: ‘tathā hi panāhaṁ, samma, iminā mahatā pabbatena āvuto daṭṭheyyaṁ nāddasan’ti.
analyzed: tathā hi pana āha samme iminā mahatā pabbatena āvutaḥ daṭṭheyyam na addasanti

original: Ato mahantatarena, aggivessana, ‘avijjākhandhena jayaseno rājakumāro āvuto nivuto ophuṭo pariyonaddho.
analyzed: atas mahantatarena aggivessana avijjā khandhena jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ āvutaḥ nivutaḥ ophuṭaḥ pariyonaddhaḥ

original: So vata yaṁ taṁ nekkhammena ñātabbaṁ nekkhammena daṭṭhabbaṁ nekkhammena pattabbaṁ
analyzed: saḥ vata yam tam nekkhammena ñātabbam nekkhammena daṭṭhabbam nekkhammena pattabba

original: nekkhammena sacchikātabbaṁ taṁ vata jayaseno rājakumāro kāmamajjhe vasanto kāme paribhuñjanto
analyzed: nekkhammena sacchikātabbam tam vata jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ kāma majjhe vasantaḥ kāme paribhuñjantaḥ

original: kāmavitakkehi khajjamāno kāmapariḷāhena pariḍayhamāno kāmapariyesanāya ussuko ñassati
analyzed: kāma vitakkehi khajjamānaḥ kāma pariḷāhena pariḍayhamānaḥ kāma pariyesanāya ussukaḥ ñassati

original: vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissatī’ti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vā dakkhati vā sacchi vā karissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Sace kho taṁ, aggivessana, jayasenassa rājakumārassa imā dve upamā paṭibhāyeyyuṁ, anacchariyaṁ te jayaseno rājakumāro pasīdeyya, pasanno ca te pasannākāraṁ kareyyā”ti.
analyzed: sace kho te aggivessana jayasenassa rāja kumārassa imāḥ dve upamāḥ paṭibhāyeyyu anacchariyam te jayasenaḥ rāja kumāraḥ pasīdeyya pasannaḥ ca te pasanna ākāram kareyya ati

original: “Kuto pana maṁ, bhante, jayasenassa rājakumārassa imā dve upamā paṭibhāyissanti anacchariyā pubbe assutapubbā, seyyathāpi bhagavantan”ti?
analyzed: kutas pana ma bhante jayasenassa rāja kumārassa imāḥ dve upamāḥ paṭibhāyissanti an acchariyā pubbe a suta pubbā seyyathā api bhagavantam ti

original: “Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto nāgavanikaṁ āmanteti:
analyzed: sa iyyathā api aggivessana rājā khattiyaḥ muddhāvasittaḥ nāga vanikam āmanteti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, samma nāgavanika, rañño nāgaṁ abhiruhitvā nāgavanaṁ pavisitvā āraññakaṁ nāgaṁ atipassitvā rañño nāgassa gīvāyaṁ upanibandhāhī’ti.
analyzed: ehi tva samma nāgavanika raññaḥ nāgam abhiruhitvā nāga vanam pavisitvā āraññakam nāgam atipassitvā raññaḥ nāgassa gīvāyam upanibandhāhi iti

original: ‘Evaṁ, devā’ti kho, aggivessana, nāgavaniko rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa paṭissutvā
analyzed: eva deva ati kho aggivessana nāgavanikaḥ raññaḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa paṭissutvā

original: rañño nāgaṁ abhiruhitvā nāgavanaṁ pavisitvā āraññakaṁ nāgaṁ atipassitvā rañño nāgassa
analyzed: raññaḥ nāgam abhiruhitvā nāgavanam pavisitvā āraññakam nāgam atipassitvā raññaḥ nāgassa

original: gīvāyaṁ upanibandhati.
analyzed: gīvā ayam upanibandhati

original: Tamenaṁ rañño nāgo abbhokāsaṁ nīharati.
analyzed: tam enam raññaḥ nāgaḥ abbhokāsam nīharati

original: Ettāvatā kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo abbhokāsaṁ gato hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā kho aggivessanaḥ āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ abbhokāsam gataḥ hoti

original: Etthagedhā hi, aggivessana, āraññakā nāgā yadidaṁ—nāgavanaṁ.
analyzed: etthagedhāḥ hi aggivessana āraññakāḥ nāgāḥ

original: Tamenaṁ nāgavaniko rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa ārocesi:
analyzed: tam enam nāgavanikaḥ raññaḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa ārocesi

original: ‘abbhokāsagato kho, deva, āraññako nāgo’ti.
analyzed: abbhokāsa gataḥ kho deva āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ ti

original: Atha kho aggivessana, tamenaṁ rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto hatthidamakaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho aggivessana tam enam rājā khattiyaḥ muddhāvasittaḥ hatthidamakam āmantesi

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, samma hatthidamaka, āraññakaṁ nāgaṁ damayāhi āraññakānañceva sīlānaṁ abhinimmadanāya
analyzed: ehi tva samma hatthidamaka āraññakam nāgam damayāhi āraññakānam ca iva sīlānam abhinimmadanāya

original: āraññakānañceva sarasaṅkappānaṁ abhinimmadanāya āraññakānañceva darathakilamathapariḷāhānaṁ
analyzed: āraññakānam ca iva sara saṅkappānam abhinimmadanāya āraññakānam ca iva daratha kilamatha pariḷāhānam

original: abhinimmadanāya gāmante abhiramāpanāya manussakantesu sīlesu samādapanāyā’ti.
analyzed: abhinimmadanāya gāmante abhiramāpanāya manussa kantesu sīlesu samādapanāya ati

original: ‘Evaṁ, devā’ti kho, aggivessana, hatthidamako rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa
analyzed: eva deva ati kho aggivessana hatthidamakaḥ raññaḥ khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa

original: paṭissutvā mahantaṁ thambhaṁ pathaviyaṁ nikhaṇitvā āraññakassa nāgassa gīvāyaṁ upanibandhati
analyzed: paṭissutvā mahantam thambham pathaviyam nikhaṇitvā āraññakassa nāgassa gīvāyam upanibandhati

original: āraññakānañceva sīlānaṁ abhinimmadanāya āraññakānañceva sarasaṅkappānaṁ abhinimmadanāya
analyzed: āraññakānam ca iva sīlānam abhinimmadanāya āraññakānam ca iva sara saṅkappānam abhinimmadanāya

original: āraññakānañceva darathakilamathapariḷāhānaṁ abhinimmadanāya gāmante abhiramāpanāya
analyzed: āraññakānam ca iva daratha kilamatha pariḷāhānam abhinimmadanāya gāmante abhiramāpanāya

original: manussakantesu sīlesu samādapanāya.
analyzed: manussa kantesu sīlesu samādapanāya

original: Tamenaṁ hatthidamako yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpāhi vācāhi samudācarati.
analyzed: tam enam hatthidamakaḥ yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇa sukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahu jana kantā bahu jana manāpā tathārūpāhi vācāhi samudācarati

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo hatthidamakassa yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessanaḥ āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ hatthidamakassa yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇa sukhā pemanīyā

original: hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpāhi vācāhi samudācariyamāno
analyzed: hadayaṅgamā porī bahu jana kantā bahu jana manāpā tathārūpāhi vācāhi samudācariyamānaḥ

original: sussūsati, sotaṁ odahati, aññā cittaṁ upaṭṭhāpeti;
analyzed: sussūsati sotam odahati aññā cittam upaṭṭhāpeti

original: tamenaṁ hatthidamako uttari tiṇaghāsodakaṁ anuppavecchati.
analyzed: tam enam hatthi damakaḥ uttari tiṇa ghāsa udakam anuppavecchati

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo hatthidamakassa tiṇaghāsodakaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti, tatra hatthidamakassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessanaḥ āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ hatthi damakassa tiṇa ghāsa udakam paṭiggaṇhāti tatra hatthi damakassa evam hoti

original: ‘jīvissati kho dāni āraññako nāgo’ti.
analyzed: jīvissati kho dāni āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ ti

original: Tamenaṁ hatthidamako uttari kāraṇaṁ kāreti:
analyzed: tam enam hatthidamakaḥ uttari kāraṇam kāreti

original: ‘ādiya, bho, nikkhipa, bho’ti.
analyzed: ādiya bho nikkhipa bhoti

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo hatthidamakassa ādānanikkhepe vacanakaro hoti ovādappaṭikaro, tamenaṁ hatthidamako uttari kāraṇaṁ kāreti:
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessana āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ hatthi damakassa ādāna nikkhepe vacana karaḥ hoti ovāda ppaṭikaraḥ tam enam hatthi damakaḥ uttari kāraṇam kāreti

original: ‘abhikkama, bho, paṭikkama, bho’ti.
analyzed: abhikkama bho paṭikkama bhoti

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo hatthidamakassa abhikkamapaṭikkamavacanakaro hoti ovādappaṭikaro, tamenaṁ hatthidamako uttari kāraṇaṁ kāreti:
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessana āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ hatthi damakassa abhikkama paṭikkama vacana karaḥ hoti ovāda ppaṭikaraḥ tam enam hatthi damakaḥ uttari kāraṇam kāreti

original: ‘uṭṭhaha, bho, nisīda, bho’ti.
analyzed: uṭṭhaha bho nisīda bho ti

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, āraññako nāgo hatthidamakassa uṭṭhānanisajjāya vacanakaro
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessanaḥ āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ hatthi damakassa uṭṭhāna nisajjāya vacana karaḥ

original: hoti ovādappaṭikaro, tamenaṁ hatthidamako uttari āneñjaṁ nāma kāraṇaṁ kāreti, mahantassa
analyzed: hoti ovāda paṭikaraḥ tam enam hatthidamakaḥ uttari āneñjam nāma kāraṇam kāreti mahantassa

original: phalakaṁ soṇḍāya upanibandhati, tomarahattho ca puriso uparigīvāya nisinno hoti,
analyzed: phalakam soṇḍāya upanibandhati tomara hattho ca purisaḥ uparigīvāya nisinno hoti

original: samantato ca tomarahatthā purisā parivāretvā ṭhitā honti, hatthidamako ca dīghatomarayaṭṭhiṁ
analyzed: samantataḥ ca tomara hatthā purisā parivāretvā ṭhitāḥ honti hatthi damakaḥ ca dīghatomara yaṭṭhi

original: gahetvā purato ṭhito hoti.
analyzed: gahetvā puratas ṭhitaḥ hoti

original: So āneñjaṁ kāraṇaṁ kāriyamāno neva purime pāde copeti na pacchime pāde copeti, na
analyzed: saḥ āneñjam kāraṇam kāriyamānaḥ na iva purime pāde ca upeti na pacchime pāde ca upeti na

original: purimakāyaṁ copeti na pacchimakāyaṁ copeti, na sīsaṁ copeti, na kaṇṇe copeti, na
analyzed: purima kāyam ca upeti na pacchima kāyam ca upeti na sīsam ca upeti na kaṇṇe ca upeti na

original: dante copeti, na naṅguṭṭhaṁ copeti, na soṇḍaṁ copeti.
analyzed: dante ca upeti na naṅguṭṭham ca upeti na soṇḍam ca upeti

original: So hoti āraññako nāgo khamo sattippahārānaṁ asippahārānaṁ usuppahārānaṁ sarapattappahārānaṁ
analyzed: saḥ hoti āraññakaḥ nāgaḥ khamaḥ satti ppahārānam asi ppahārānam usu ppahārānam sara patta ppahārānam

original: bheripaṇavavaṁsasaṅkhaḍiṇḍimaninnādasaddānaṁ sabbavaṅkadosanihitaninnītakasāvo rājāraho
analyzed: bheri paṇava vasa saṅkha ḍiṇḍima ninnāda saddānam sabba vaṅka dosa nihita ninnīta kasāvaḥ

original: rājabhoggo rañño aṅganteva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: rāja bhoggaḥ raññaḥ aṅgantā iva saṅkham gacchati

original: Evameva kho, aggivessana, idha tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā.
analyzed: evam eva kho aggivessana idha tathāgataḥ loke uppajjati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampannaḥ sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā

original: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
analyzed: saḥ imam lokam sa devakam sa mārakam sa brahmakam sa ssamaṇa brāhmaṇim pajam sa deva manussam sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti

original: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāseti.
analyzed: saḥ dhammam deseti ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāseti

original: Taṁ dhammaṁ suṇāti gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā aññatarasmiṁ vā kule paccājāto.
analyzed: tam dhammam suṇāti gahapati vā gahapati putto vā aññatarasmim vā kule paccājātaḥ

original: So taṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhati.
analyzed: saḥ tam dhammam sutvā tathāgate saddham paṭilabhati

original: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhati:
analyzed: saḥ tena saddhā paṭilābhena samannāgataḥ iti paṭisañcikkhati

original: ‘sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
analyzed: sambādhaḥ gharāvāsaḥ rajāpathaḥ abbhokāsaḥ pabbajjā

original: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: So aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya
analyzed: so aparena samayena appam vā bhogakkhandham pahāya mahantam vā bhogakkhandham pahāya

original: appaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ ohāretvā
analyzed: appam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya mahantam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya kesa massuṃ ohāretvā

original: kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajati.
analyzed: kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajati

original: Ettāvatā kho, aggivessana, ariyasāvako abbhokāsagato hoti.
analyzed: ettāvatā kho aggivessana ariya sāvakaḥ abbhokāsa gataḥ hoti

original: Etthagedhā hi, aggivessana, devamanussā yadidaṁ—pañca kāmaguṇā.
analyzed: etthagedhāḥ hi aggivessana deva manussāḥ kāma guṇā

original: Tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vinā iti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, sīlavā hohi, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharāhi ācāragocarasampanno, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesū’ti.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu sīlavā hohi pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharāhi ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhassu sikkhāpadesu uti

original: Yato kho, aggivessana, ariyasāvako sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati
analyzed: yatas kho aggivessana ariya sāvakaḥ sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati

original: ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu,
analyzed: ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vinā iti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, indriyesu guttadvāro hohi, cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā mā nimittaggāhī …pe…
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu indriyesu gutta dvāraḥ hohi cakkhunā rūpam disvā mā nimitta ggāhī pe

original: (yathā gaṇakamoggallānasuttante, evaṁ vitthāretabbāni.)
analyzed: yathā gaṇaka moggallāna suttante evam vitthāretabbāni

original: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
analyzed: saḥ ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetasaḥ upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe

original: kāye kāyānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: kāye kāya anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Vedanāsu …pe…
analyzed: vedanāsu pe

original: citte …
analyzed: citte

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṁ.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharati ātāpī sampajānaḥ satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa

original: Seyyathāpi, aggivessana, hatthidamako mahantaṁ thambhaṁ pathaviyaṁ nikhaṇitvā āraññakassa
analyzed: seyyathā api aggivessana hatthi damakaḥ mahantam thambham pathaviyam nikhaṇitvā āraññakassa

original: nāgassa gīvāyaṁ upanibandhati āraññakānañceva sīlānaṁ abhinimmadanāya āraññakānañceva
analyzed: nāgassa gīvāyam upanibandhati āraññakānam ca iva sīlānam abhinimmadanāya āraññakānam ca iva

original: sarasaṅkappānaṁ abhinimmadanāya āraññakānañceva darathakilamathapariḷāhānaṁ abhinimmadanāya
analyzed: sara saṅkappānam abhinimmadanāya āraññakānam ca iva daratha kilamatha pariḷāhānam abhinimmadanāya

original: gāmante abhiramāpanāya manussakantesu sīlesu samādapanāya;
analyzed: gāmante abhiramāpanāya manussa kantesu sīlesu samādapanāya

original: evameva kho, aggivessana, ariyasāvakassa ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā cetaso upanibandhanā
analyzed: evam eva kho aggivessana ariya sāvakassa ime cattāro sati paṭṭhānā cetasaḥ upanibandhanā

original: honti gehasitānañceva sīlānaṁ abhinimmadanāya gehasitānañceva sarasaṅkappānaṁ abhinimmadanāya
analyzed: honti geha sitānam ca iva sīlānam abhinimmadanāya geha sitānam ca iva sara saṅkappānam abhinimmadanāya

original: gehasitānañceva darathakilamathapariḷāhānaṁ abhinimmadanāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya.
analyzed: geha sitānam ca iva daratha kilamatha pariḷāhānam abhinimmadanāya ñāyassa adhigamāya nibbānassa sacchikiriyāya

original: Tamenaṁ tathāgato uttariṁ vineti:
analyzed: tam enam tathāgataḥ uttarim vinā iti

original: ‘ehi tvaṁ, bhikkhu, kāye kāyānupassī viharāhi, mā ca kāmūpasaṁhitaṁ vitakkaṁ vitakkesi.
analyzed: ehi tva bhikkhu kāye kāya anupassī viharāhi mā ca kāma upasahitam vitakkam vitakkesi

original: Vedanāsu …
analyzed: vedanāsu

original: citte …
analyzed: citte

original: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāhi, mā ca kāmūpasaṁhitaṁ vitakkaṁ vitakkesī’ti.
analyzed: dhammesu dhamma anupassī viharāhi mā ca kāma upasahitam vitakkam vitakkesi iti

original: So vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: saḥ vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmeti.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmeti

original: So anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussarati.
analyzed: so aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati sa iyyathida ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussarati

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṁ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmeti.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte sattānam cutūpapāta ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmeti

original: So dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe, sugate duggate …pe… yathākammūpage satte pajānāti.
analyzed: so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkanta mānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate pe yathā kamma upage satte pajānāti

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmeti.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte āsavānam khaya ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmeti

original: So ‘idaṁ dukkhan’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
analyzed: saḥ idam dukkhan ti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dukkha samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodho ti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti;
analyzed: yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: ‘ime āsavā’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ‘ayaṁ āsavasamudayo’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti,
analyzed: ime āsavāḥ ti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam āsava samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: ‘ayaṁ āsavanirodho’ti yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti, ‘ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti
analyzed: ayam āsava nirodha uti yathābhūtam pajānāti ayam āsava nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati

original: yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
analyzed: yathābhūtam pajānāti

original: Tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, bhavāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati, avijjāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati.
analyzed: tassa evam jānataḥ evam passataḥ kāma āsavā api cittam vimuccati bhava āsavā api cittam vimuccati avijjā āsavā api cittam vimuccati

original: Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
analyzed: vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānāti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti

original: So hoti bhikkhu khamo sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya ḍaṁsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassānaṁ
analyzed: so hoti bhikkhu khamo sītassa uṇhassa jighacchāya pipāsāya

original: duruttānaṁ durāgatānaṁ vacanapathānaṁ, uppannānaṁ sārīrikānaṁ vedanānaṁ dukkhānaṁ
analyzed: duruttānam durāgatānam vacana pathānam uppannānam sārīrikānam vedanānam dukkhānam

original: tibbānaṁ kharānaṁ kaṭukānaṁ asātānaṁ amanāpānaṁ pāṇaharānaṁ adhivāsakajātiko hoti
analyzed: tibbānam kharānam kaṭukānam asātānam amanāpānam pāṇa harānam adhivāsaka jātikaḥ hoti

original: sabbarāgadosamohanihitaninnītakasāvo āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
analyzed: sabba rāga dosa moha nihita ninnīta kasāvaḥ āhuneyyo pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyaḥ anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa

original: Mahallako cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo adanto avinīto kālaṁ karoti, ‘adantamaraṇaṁ mahallako rañño nāgo kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: mahallakaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ a dantaḥ a vinītaḥ kālam karoti a danta maraṇam mahallakaḥ raññaḥ nāgaḥ saṅkham gacchati

original: majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo.
analyzed: majjhimaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ

original: Daharo cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo adanto avinīto kālaṁ karoti, ‘adantamaraṇaṁ daharo rañño nāgo kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: daharaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ adantaḥ avinīto kālam karoti adanta maraṇam daharaḥ raññaḥ nāgaḥ saṅkham gacchati

original: evameva kho, aggivessana, thero cepi bhikkhu akhīṇāsavo kālaṁ karoti, ‘adantamaraṇaṁ thero bhikkhu kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: evam eva kho aggivessana theraḥ ce pi bhikkhu akhīṇa āsavaḥ kālam karoti adantamaraṇam theraḥ bhikkhu saṅkham gacchati

original: majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu.
analyzed: majjhimaḥ cepi aggivessana bhikkhu

original: Navo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu akhīṇāsavo kālaṁ karoti, ‘adantamaraṇaṁ navo bhikkhu kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: navaḥ ce pi aggivessana bhikkhu a khīṇa āsavaḥ kālam karoti adanta maraṇam navaḥ bhikkhu saṅkham gacchati

original: Mahallako cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo sudanto suvinīto kālaṁ karoti, ‘dantamaraṇaṁ mahallako rañño nāgo kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: mahallakaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ su dantaḥ su vinīto kālam karoti danta maraṇam mahallakaḥ raññaḥ nāgaḥ saṅkham gacchati

original: majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo …
analyzed: majjhimaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ

original: daharo cepi, aggivessana, rañño nāgo sudanto suvinīto kālaṁ karoti, ‘dantamaraṇaṁ daharo rañño nāgo kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: daharaḥ cepi aggivessana raññaḥ nāgaḥ su danto su vinīto kālam karoti danta maraṇam daharaḥ raññaḥ nāgaḥ saṅkham gacchati

original: evameva kho, aggivessana, thero cepi bhikkhu khīṇāsavo kālaṁ karoti, ‘dantamaraṇaṁ thero bhikkhu kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchati;
analyzed: evam eva kho aggivessana theraḥ ce pi bhikkhu khīṇa āsavaḥ kālam karoti dantamaraṇam theraḥ bhikkhu saṅkham gacchati

original: majjhimo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu.
analyzed: majjhimaḥ cepi aggivessana bhikkhu

original: Navo cepi, aggivessana, bhikkhu khīṇāsavo kālaṁ karoti, ‘dantamaraṇaṁ navo bhikkhu kālaṅkato’tveva saṅkhaṁ gacchatī”ti.
analyzed: navaḥ ce pi aggivessana bhikkhu khīṇa āsavaḥ kālam karoti danta maraṇam navaḥ bhikkhu saṅkham gacchati iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamano aciravato samaṇuddeso bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandīti.
analyzed: atta manaḥ aciravataḥ samaṇuddesaḥ bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandi iti

original: Dantabhūmisuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: dantabhūmi suttam niṭṭhitam pañcama
